caption:
“Hearts of stone become hearts of flesh.” — Ezekiel 36:26

Reflection:
Grace softens what grief has hardened. The divine touch turns coldness into compassion.

Commentary:
Ezekiel’s promise reveals God’s power to renew us from within. No heart is beyond healing; mercy makes all things tender again.
